Olympic Games

ESPAÑOL

Track & Field (Athletics) / European Championships

Rome 2024 Munich 2022 Berlin 2018 Amsterdam 2016 Zürich 2014 Helsinki 2012 Barcelona 2010 Göteborg 2006 Munich 2002 Budapest 1998 Helsinki 1994 Split 1990 Stuttgart 1986 Athens 1982 Prague 1978

WOMEN (since 1978)

The European Athletics Championships traditionally occurred every four years, but since 2010 the European Athletic Association organizes them every two, which has largely devalued the competition in Olympic years, as the best athletes either do not participate or are not in their peak form. When the games are held in the same year as Summer Olympics, no marathon and racewalking events are contested. The 2020 edition, which was to be celebrated in Paris, was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
